AT.name: Rayman® Advance
AT.description: Rayman Advance, ist ein zur Seite scrollendes Plattformspiel im unglaublich farbenfrohen Rayman-Universum. Raymans Aufgabe besteht darin, durch sechs völlig verrückte Welten zu laufen, zu rutschen und zu schwingen, dabei magische Kräfte aufzulesen und schließlich die bösen Pläne von Mr. Dark zu vereiteln. Neben seinem Hauptauftrag muss sich Rayman zusätzlichen Herausforderungen stellen und beispielsweise auf allen Stufen verstreute Blue Tings einsammeln.Trotz Raymans freundlichem Auftreten ist seine Aufgabe alles andere als ein Zuckerschlecken. Selbst erfahrenen Spielern wird es nicht leicht fallen, die fiesen Hauptgegner zu besiegen und die verzwickten Rätsel zu lösen, aber der Schwierigkeitsgrad steigt allmählich an und erreicht nie die Stufe des Unmöglichen.

AU.name: Rayman® Advance
AU.description: Rayman Advance is a side-scrolling platformer based in the eye-poppingly psychedelic Rayman universe. Rayman's mission is to run, slide and swing through six utterly surreal worlds, collecting magical powers and ultimately thwarting the evil plans of Mr. Dark. In addition to Rayman's main mission, he's also faced with extra challenges like collecting Blue Tings scattered throughout every stage. Despite Rayman's jovial demeanor, his quest is far from a walk in the park. Even experienced gamers will be challenged by nasty bosses and perplexing puzzles, but the difficulty level rises gradually and never reaches the realm of impossibility.

BG.name: Rayman® Advance
BG.description: Rayman Advance is a side-scrolling platformer based in the eye-poppingly psychedelic Rayman universe. Rayman's mission is to run, slide and swing through six utterly surreal worlds, collecting magical powers and ultimately thwarting the evil plans of Mr. Dark. In addition to Rayman's main mission, he's also faced with extra challenges like collecting Blue Tings scattered throughout every stage. Despite Rayman's jovial demeanor, his quest is far from a walk in the park. Even experienced gamers will be challenged by nasty bosses and perplexing puzzles, but the difficulty level rises gradually and never reaches the realm of impossibility.

BE.name: Rayman® Advance
BE.description: Rayman Advance est un jeu de plates-formes à défilement horizontal situé dans l'univers étonnant et psychédélique de Rayman. La mission de Rayman consiste ici à courir, glisser et tournoyer à travers six mondes totalement surréalistes, à ramasser des pouvoirs magiques et à faire échouer les plans maléfiques de Mr. Dark. Au-delà de cette quête principale, Rayman devra relever des défis annexes : ramasser les grelots bleus éparpillés dans chacun des niveaux, par exemple. Ne vous laissez pas tromper par l'apparence joviale de Rayman : sa quête est loin d'être une promenade de santé... Si les boss puissants et les énigmes délicates constituent un défi, même pour les joueurs expérimentés, la difficulté augmente progressivement et les épreuves n'atteignent jamais un degré impossible.

ES.name: Rayman® Advance
ES.description: La misión de Rayman es correr, deslizarse y balancearse por seis mundos totalmente surrealistas, ir haciéndose con los poderes mágicos y, por último, frustrar los malvados planes de Mr. Dark. Además de la misión principal, Rayman debe enfrentarse a otros desafíos como recoger los Blue Tings que hay dispersos en cada nivel.A pesar del comportamiento jovial de Rayman, su búsqueda no es precisamente coser y cantar.Los peliagudos jefazos y los desconcertantes acertijos serán un reto incluso para los jugadores más experimentados, pero el nivel de dificultad aumenta poco a poco y nunca llega a ser totalmente imposible.

IT.name: Rayman® Advance
IT.description: Rayman Advance è un platform a scorrimento laterale ambientato nello psichedelico e stupefacente universo di Rayman. La missione di Rayman consiste nel correre, scivolare e dondolarsi in sei mondi estremamente surreali, raccogliendo poteri magici e infine sventando i malvagi piani di Mr. Dark. Oltre alla missione principale, Rayman dovrà anche affrontare sfide extra, come ad esempio raccogliere i Blue Tings sparsi in ogni livello. Nonostante l'atteggiamento gioviale di Rayman, la sua missione non è affatto una passeggiata; anche i giocatori esperti dovranno impegnarsi per superare i perfidi boss e i difficili rompicapo, ma il livello di difficoltà aumenta gradualmente e non diventa mai impossibile da affrontare.

NL.name: Rayman® Advance
NL.description: Rayman Advance is een 2D platformer in het bijzonder kleurrijke Rayman-universum. Het is Rayman´s taak om te rennen, te glijden en te zweven door zes wonderlijke werelden. Onderweg krijgt hij diverse magische krachten toebedeeld die vereist zijn om de snode plannen van de duistere Mr. Dark te dwarsbomen. Naast dit hoofddoel kan Rayman ook andere uitdagingen aangaan, zoals het verzamelen van de Blue Tings die je overal tegenkomt. Vergis je niet in Rayman´s vrolijke voorkomen, want zijn avontuur wordt geen makkie. Zelfs ervaren spelers komen niet gemakkelijk voorbij de sluwe eindbazen en breinbrekende puzzels. De moeilijkheidsgraad loopt langzaam op, maar stijgt nooit naar onmogelijke hoogtes.

NZ.name: Rayman® Advance
NZ.description: Rayman Advance is a side-scrolling platformer based in the eye-poppingly psychedelic Rayman universe. Rayman's mission is to run, slide and swing through six utterly surreal worlds, collecting magical powers and ultimately thwarting the evil plans of Mr. Dark. In addition to Rayman's main mission, he's also faced with extra challenges like collecting Blue Tings scattered throughout every stage. Despite Rayman's jovial demeanor, his quest is far from a walk in the park. Even experienced gamers will be challenged by nasty bosses and perplexing puzzles, but the difficulty level rises gradually and never reaches the realm of impossibility.

PL.name: Rayman® Advance
PL.description: Rayman Advance is a side-scrolling platformer based in the eye-poppingly psychedelic Rayman universe. Rayman's mission is to run, slide and swing through six utterly surreal worlds, collecting magical powers and ultimately thwarting the evil plans of Mr. Dark. In addition to Rayman's main mission, he's also faced with extra challenges like collecting Blue Tings scattered throughout every stage. Despite Rayman's jovial demeanor, his quest is far from a walk in the park. Even experienced gamers will be challenged by nasty bosses and perplexing puzzles, but the difficulty level rises gradually and never reaches the realm of impossibility.

PT.name: Rayman® Advance
PT.description: Rayman Advance é um jogo de plataformas de deslocamento lateral, baseado no vistoso e psicadélico universo do Rayman. A missão do Rayman consiste em correr, deslizar e balançar-se por seis mundos totalmente surrealistas, enquanto obtém poderes mágicos, de modo a impedir os planos malévolos do Mr. Dark. Para além da missão principal, o Rayman irá enfrentar outros desafios, tais como reunir Blue Tings que estão espalhadas em cada nível. Apesar do comportamento jovial do Rayman, a sua aventura está longe de ser fácil. Até mesmo os jogadores mais experientes serão desafiados a ultrapassar bosses complicados e quebra-cabeças desconcertantes, mas o nível de dificuldade aumenta pouco a pouco sem nunca chegar a ser completamente impossível.

RU.name: Rayman® Advance
RU.description: Rayman Advance — это сайд-скроллер, действие которого происходит в ярком психоделическом мире Рэймана. Задача Рэймана — бегать, прыгать и скользить по шести абсолютно нереальным мирам, собирать волшебные способности и в конечном счете разрушить злобные планы мистера Дарка. Кроме основного задания, Рэймана ждут дополнительные испытания, например сбор синих тингов, в изобилии разбросанных на каждом уровне. Несмотря на жизнерадостную натуру Рэймана, приключение не покажется вам легкой прогулкой. Даже опытным игрокам будет непросто справиться с мерзкими боссами и запутанными головоломками, но все-таки уровень сложности поднимается постепенно и никогда не достигает невозможных высот.

Rayman's mission is to run, slide and swing through six utterly surreal worlds, collecting magical powers and ultimately thwarting the evil plans of Mr. Dark.
